Material : Jeans
Flexibility : Moderate
 Size : 27 28 29

 Tile Measurement Size:
 27:Waist:70cm Hip:82cm Front Files:21.5cm After Files:28.5cm Thigh:45cm Leg opening:25.5cm Length:96.5cm
 28:Waist:72cm Hip:84cm Front Files:22cm After Files:29cm Thigh:46cm Leg opening:26cm Length:97cm
 29:Waist:74cm Hip:86cm Front Files:22.5cm After Files:29.5cm Thigh:47cm Leg opening:26.5cm Length:97.5cm

 There maybe tolerance of 2cm if by different measurement method.
